```{r}
library(tidyverse)
files_eu <- list.files("data/EU espacial/",full.names = TRUE)
files_sp <- list.files("data/SP espacial/",full.names = TRUE)

```


## Mapas Eucalipto

```{r}
for(i in seq(files_eu)){
  mp<-read.table(files_eu[i],skip = 5)
  image(mp %>%  as.matrix(),xlab = files_eu[i])
}
```
